name: DeployUsingPowerShell
description: Execute PowerShell commands remotely on machine(s)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the created lab environment.

inputs.name: MachineNames
inputs.label: Machine Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of machine names (IP address/fqdn).

inputs.name: ApplicationPath
inputs.label: Application Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path on target machines where source package would get copied.

inputs.name: ScriptPath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute or UNC path of the PS/DSC script on the target machines.

inputs.name: InitializationScriptPath
inputs.label: Initialization Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute or UNC path of the PS initialization script (data script for DSC) on the target machines.

inputs.name: AlternateCredentialsUsername
inputs.label: Alternate Credentials Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username of the alternate credentials required to connect to the VSO service. See http://aka.ms/ALTCREDENTIALS for more information

inputs.name: AlternateCredentialsPassword
inputs.label: Alternate Credentials Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password of the alternate credentials required to connect to the VSO service. See http://aka.ms/ALTCREDENTIALS for more information
